    • Uses of Rule in goal.core.program.rules

      Subclasses of Rule in goal.core.program.rules 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ForallDoRule
      A rule of the form:
          forall CONDITION do RESULT.

      Where CONDITION is a MentalStateCond, and RESULT an ActionCombo.
      class  IfThenRule
      A rule of the form:
          if CONDITION then RESULT

      Where CONDITION is a MentalStateCond, and RESULT an ActionCombo.
      class  ListallDoRule
      A rule of the form:
          listall CONDITION -> VAR do RESULT.
      or:
          listall VAR <- CONDITION do RESULT.
      Methods in goal.core.program.rules that return Rule
